content.body: Would it make sense to have Matrix channels for most Stage 1 proposals? I'd like to create channels for a few proposals for discussions, but apparently don't have that level of access in the TC39 space.
As still a relative newcomer, I'd enjoy such channels and think it would make it easier to participate in tc39
anyone can create a new room in the matrix.org server; I guess you can ask here for help adding the room to the space afterwards
